Welcome to career.place, where candidates are evaluated on what matters; fairly, objectively, and without bias

The career.place Process

Tips for the candidate

  • Be Honest: The job must work for you. If you do not meet the requirements or the job doesnâ€™t meet yours, move on. Your time is too valuable to waste on a bad fit.
  • Be Bold: Take the time to really show off in steps two and three. This is your chance to impress your future manager, team, and colleagues, so take it seriously.
  • Provide a good email address: We use your email address to send important alerts about your progress as well as for employers to contact you once they unlock your information.
  • Fill out your profile: Include all the information, attachments, and links you want the employers to see once they unlock your information.
